wikipedia_page.main: Brian Howard Hord  (20 June 1934 – 30 August 2015) was a British chartered surveyor and politician. He served for one term as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) and maintained his involvement in the Conservative Party and in public life; he was Chairman of a health authority for six years.

link_mentions.page: List of members of the European Parliament for the United Kingdom (1979–1984)

response: * Brian Hord CBE, Member of the European Parliament for London West from 1979 to 1984
